name: Darkness Inside
description:
Add to your wishlist

Story

In this game, the owner of the house got disappeared. And The last place he was seen was his home. Your task is to explore the house to find evidence about what happened to him. The house is filled with dark entities, so you need to protect your sanity! The game takes its horror on its atmosphere.

Gameplay

The game has a first-person perspective and is primarily a walking-simulator horror game. You will be walking in the house to reveal the next event. The game heavily Contains Jump-scares!
